section.title: Configuring event pruning
section.para: The event pruning feature allows administrators to manage how long registered events are stored in the database and how often the expired events are removed.
The following configuration options are available:

listitem.para: The number of days registered events are stored in the database. The default value is 10. Keep in mind that pruneEventsOlderThan can be set to 0. However, this deletes all events whenever the cron job runs, making it impossible to analyze and troubleshoot issues with the application
The frequency of the cron job that deletes expired events. The default value is "0 0 * * *", which runs daily at midnight.
